name: Infranatural
description:
A walking simulator by Gil Lawson and Will Rhodes.

You have an incredible capacity. This is a remarkable land. The cultivars are off the charts. The conditions are absolutely prime. The weather is nice.

There are things here we have to have. There's information in and under this digital space. Punch holes in precisely the right spots.

Load in, behave, complete the task. You've done it a hundred times before. This shouldn't be any different.
